entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kuujjuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -28.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuaq Airport 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -28.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -31.8°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 47 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
